\N<Luda Soldier>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants cannot proceed any further.

\N<Luda Soldier>A training session is currently being held in the arena.
Those who are not participants cannot proceed any further.

\N<Luda Soldier>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants cannot proceed any further.
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■Event■>
\N<Luda Soldier>Your turn isn't up yet. What business do you have here?
\N<Segi>I heard that Irime's match is about to start...

\N<Luda Soldier>Hmm... The match between Irime and Rozaro, huh? If you wish
to watch, head to the spectator seats.
A

\N<Luda Soldier>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants cannot proceed any further.

\N<Luda Soldier>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants cannot proceed any further.
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■Event■>
\N<Segi>...Hello.

\N<Luda Soldier>...So you've come. I wonder how many times we've had
conversations like this here.
\N<Segi>...Yes, it does feel a bit strange.

\N<Luda Soldier>Now, as per tradition, we need to process the temporary
exemption for your husband Yuia's charges. Present the
relevant documents.

\N<Luda Soldier>You must have faced various trials to get here. There were
times when you blamed and cursed yourself, even despaired.
Yet, here you stand.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Luda Soldier>I once said that a woman's pride might be the core of your
strength. My thoughts on that haven't changed.

\N<Luda Soldier>But... I understand how difficult it is to remain strong
while that spirit medicine eats away at your body. I've seen
it happen to many women.

\N<Luda Soldier>That's why... it's not wrong to be swept up and carried away
by something before your eyes. Yes, as long as you don't
lose sight of what's most important to you.
\N<Segi>Your advice... I appreciate it.
セギ02
face01
Actor1_1
B
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■Event■>
\N<Luda Soldier>What do you want? You're not scheduled to appear today.

\N<Segi>Well... I heard that today is the day of Irime-san's trial
by combat.

\N<Luda Soldier>Hmm, I see. So you've come to witness the outcome. It's not
unrelated to you either. Make sure you watch closely.
\N<Segi>...Thank you very much.
B
<ActiveMessage:\C[10]■Event■>
\N<Segi>...Hello.

\N<Luda Soldier>...I've been waiting for you. Today is going to be your last
battle.

\N<Luda Soldier>Even at this critical moment, you seem no different than
usual. Do you understand? I'm betting on you.

\N<Segi>No different than usual... That's not true at all. You're
overestimating me. Look, even now my knees are shaking with
anxiety.

\N<Luda Soldier>...I suppose so. That's natural. But still... I can't help
but expect that maybe, just maybe, you can do it.

\N<Luda Soldier>Since being stationed in this town and serving Luda, I've
witnessed a variety of scenes. Almost all of them were
horrific enough to make one want to look away.
\N<Segi>...

\N<Luda Soldier>I understand it's not like me, who serves Luda, to hold
onto hope. Nor am I in a position to indulge in such sweet
sentimentality.

\N<Luda Soldier>But... still, I can't help but feel that way. And it's all
thanks to you, no matter who might say otherwise.

\N<Segi>Why do you care so much...? Whatever happens to me is none
of your concern...

\N<Luda Soldier>Until now... yes. But it seems that won't be the case from
here on out.
\N<Segi>Eh...?

\N<Luda Soldier>In any case, the time for a conclusion is near. Whether that
conclusion will be what you desire or not depends on the
path you've taken so far.

\N<Luda Soldier>If it's a path you've walked with conviction, it won't
betray you. I hope that the result is not something forced
upon you, but what you truly wished for.
\N<Segi>Thank you... very much.
\N<Luda Soldier>...Hmm.

\N<Segi>Ah... right. If... just if, okay? If I manage to come back
here safely... would you become my friend?

\N<Segi>Is that not allowed? Perhaps there's a rule in Luda against
making friends...?

\N<Luda Soldier>Haha... You're an interesting woman. Very well, if you
return safely, let's have a drink together as friends.

\N<Segi>Oh, having a drink sounds so formal. But... I'm looking
forward to it.
セギ02
face01
Actor1_1

\N<Luda Soldier>A training session is currently being held inside. Those who
are not participants cannot proceed any further.
\N<Princess Consort Suia>...
\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe, keep moving forward, it's just ahead.
\N<Princess Consort Suia>...Just how far do you intend to take us?

\N<Zuuteruka>Now, now, you'll find out soon enough. Just a little more
patience.

\N<Seno>Hmph... Making such a big deal out of it in such an affected
way.

\N<Zuuteruka>Oops, watch your step here, there's a step. Both of you,
please proceed with care, hehehe.
\N<Zuuteruka>Alright, we've arrived. Hey, take off their blindfolds.
\N<Luda Soldier>Yes, sir.
公妃2_普通
\N<Princess Consort Suia>This place is...

\N<Zuuteruka>Don't sweat the small stuff. If I had to say, it's a place
where pitiful humans literally carve away at each other's
lives.
公妃2_怒り
\N<Princess Consort Suia>...And? What are we supposed to do here?

\N<Zuuteruka>Isn't it obvious? I told you, this is a place where lives
are literally carved away.

\N<Zuuteruka>That goes for the Luda soldiers as well. Especially for the
new recruits who are unaware of the particularly tragic and
gloomy reality.
セノ2_怒り

\N<Seno>So what? What are you trying to say? Stop beating around the
bush. Just tell us plainly what you want us to do here.

\N<Zuuteruka>Hehehe... I want you to become the night-time comfort for
those wounded recruits.
公妃2_普通
\N<Princess Consort Suia>...
セノ2_怒り

\N<Seno>Hmph... I figured it was something like that. Making such a
grandiose statement.
A
A
